Text: unable to use patch I get unable to find file? please direct me to correct patch. thanks

after installing the main exe,right click the shortcut in desktop and choose open file location.copy and paste the patch in the installed directory..run the patch.
finally run the programme and use the following serial to register 44f8cee0fa5ca249.
hope it solves the issue
